GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.English: An Experimental drug, contains tetrodotoxin, which completely shuts down central nervous system (blackout). Use at your own risk. It's higly recomended to take at least one week after the last dosage.
GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.German: Ein experimentelles Medikament, das Tetrodotoxin enthält, das das zentrale Nervensystem vollständig lahmlegt (Blackout). Die Anwendung erfolgt auf eigene Gefahr. Es wird dringend empfohlen, das Medikament nach der letzten Dosis mindestens eine Woche lang einzunehmen.
GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.Russian: Экспериментальный препарат, содержащий тетродоксин, который полностью отключает центральную нервную систему (затемнение). Используйте на свой страх и риск. Настоятельно рекомендуется принимать по крайней мере через неделю после приема последней дозы.
GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.Turkish: Deneysel bir ilaçtır, merkezi sinir sistemini tamamen kapatan tetrodoksin içerir (bayılma). Kendi sorumluluğunuzda kullanın. Son dozajdan itibaren en az bir hafta geçmesi tavsiye edilir.
GAMEPLAY_AnabioticsDescription.Italian: Una droga sperimentale, contiene tetrodotossina, il quale causa un spegnimento completo del sistema nervoso centrale (blackout). Utilizzare a proprio rischio e pericolo. Consigliato di prendersi almeno una settimana dall'ultima somministrazione.

GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.English: Sugar in a jar, don't mistake it for salt!
GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.German: Zucker im Glas: Nicht zu verwechseln mit Salz!
GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.Russian: Сахар в банке, не спутайте его с солью!
GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.Turkish: Bir kavanoz şeker, Dikkat edin tuz ile karıştırmayın!
GAMEPLAY_SugarADescription.Italian: Zucchero in un barattolo, non confonderlo con il sale!

GAMEPLAY_RosehipsCookedDescription.English: Cooked Rosehip, nothing too interesting, just mushy rosehips and water.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipsCookedDescription.Italian: Rose canine cotte, niente di interessante, solo rose canine molliccie e acqua.

GAMEPLAY_UncookedRosehipJam.Italian: Marmellata di Rosa Canina Non Cotta

GAMEPLAY_UncookedRosehipJamDescription.English: Uncooked Rose hip Jam, tastes like water and sugar with some pieces of rosehips, gross...
GAMEPLAY_UncookedRosehipJamDescription.Italian: Marmellata di rosa canina non cotta, ha un gusto di acqua e zucchero con qualche pezzo di rosa canina, che schifo...

GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamDescription.English: Thick Wild Rose Hip jam with sugar. There's nothing better than the sweet taste of childhood.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamDescription.German: Dicke Hagebuttenmarmelade mit Zucker. Es gibt nichts Besseres als den süßen Geschmack der Kindheit.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamDescription.Russian: Густое варенье из шиповника с сахаром. Нет ничего лучше сладкого вкуса из детства.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamDescription.Turkish: Şekerli kalın yabani kuşburnu reçeli. Çocukluğun tatlı tadından daha iyi bir şey yoktur.
GAMEPLAY_RosehipJamDescription.Italian: Marmellata di rosa canina densa con zucchero. Niente di meglio che il dolce sapore dell'infanzia.

GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.English: An old first aid kit, still has some bandages, antiseptic and painkillers.
GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.German: Ein alter Erste-Hilfe-Kasten. Es sind noch einige Pflaster, Antiseptika und Schmerzmittel vorhanden.
GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.Russian: В старой аптечке первой помощи еще остались бинты, антисептики и обезболивающие.
GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.Turkish: Eski bir ilk yardım çantasında hâlâ birkaç bandaj, antiseptik ve ağrı kesici var.
GAMEPLAY_FirstAidKitPainkillerDescriptio.Italian: Un vecchio kit di pronto soccorso, ha ancora delle bende, antisettico e antidolorifici.

GAMEPLAY_MorphineVialDescription.English: A vial of Morphine Sulfate for IV use. Can fill three syringes. (5mg/ml - 10ml)
GAMEPLAY_MorphineVialDescription.German: Ein Fläschchen mit Morphinsulfat für die intravenöse Anwendung. Kann drei Spritzen füllen. (5mg/ml - 10ml)
GAMEPLAY_MorphineVialDescription.Russian: Флакон морфина сульфата для внутривенного применения. Может заполнить три шприца. (5mg/ml - 10ml)
GAMEPLAY_MorphineVialDescription.French (France): Un flacon de sulfate de morphine pour usage intraveineux. Peut remplir trois seringues. (5mg/ml - 10ml)
GAMEPLAY_MorphineVialDescription.Japanese: 静脈注射用硫酸モルヒネのバイアル瓶。注射器を3本まで満たすことができる。(5mg/ml - 10ml)
GAMEPLAY_MorphineVialDescription.Spanish (Spain): Un frasco de Sulfato de Morfina para uso intravenoso. Puede llenar tres jeringas. (5mg/ml - 10ml)
GAMEPLAY_MorphineVialDescription.Italian: Una fiala di Morfina Sulfato per uso endovenoso. Può riempire tre siringhe. (5mg/ml - 10ml)

GAMEPLAY_IbuprofenDescription.English: A better version of regular painkillers
GAMEPLAY_IbuprofenDescription.Italian: Una versione migliore degli antidolorifici regolari.

GAMEPLAY_NaturalBandageDescription.English: Burdock and Cooking oil Soaked in a piece of cloth bandage.
GAMEPLAY_NaturalBandageDescription.Italian: Bardana e olio da cucina inbevuti in una benda in stoffa.
